p: Mean nucleotide and gene diversities in L. tumana were 0.00048 and 0.39, respectively ( Fig 3), lower than those in both A. linda (0.0025 and 0.85; Fig 3) and P. californica (0.0019 and 0.68; Fig 3). Allelic richness estimates from HP-RARE were also lower in L. tumana than in A. linda and P. californica, with mean values of 2.2, 6.1, and 3.6, respectively ( Table 2, Fig 3).
